other_tests.findings: Extensive tumor resection within and immediately adjacent to the spinal canal.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperatively, a marked left pleural effusion and significant residual left thoracic tumor was observed.
Tumor continued to enlarge despite radiosurgery treatment.

other_tests.findings: Massive tumor occupying the entire left hemithorax.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperative course complicated by respiratory distress syndrome.

other_tests.findings: Features characteristic of meningioma with infiltration of soft tissues, moderate nuclear atypia, mitotic figures, and areas of necrosis.
